page.title: 06THE NEWSAGENTS SHOP
page.content: "Be pleasant and keep smiling,whatever people say" said Richard and Linda Oates a friendly small newsagent near Green Park in Heckmondwike. 800 daily newspapers are sold- The Daily Mirror being the most popular followed by The Sun and The Star.Friday sees over 1000 newspapers sold as the Heckmondwike Reporter and Herald are also on sale. Radio & T.V.Times are the most popular magazines, Mars bars and Twix are the most popular sweets, orange juice the favourite drink and Benson and Hedges are their best selling cigarettes. After papers, birthday cards are their most popular selling commodity. Would you like to begin your working day at 5 a.m. every day 6 days a week for 13 hour sessions? No wonder Richard smilingly says "Hardly anything would make me work Sundays" and Linda agrees with him. {CHRISTOPHER SUMMERSCALES.
